title: (4940-527) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
title_short: (4940-527) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Bombeiros Voluntários
description: Motorhome service area. Really nice. Very large with all services including electricity.

title: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Doutor Aquilino Ribeiro
title_short: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 1 Rua Doutor Aquilino Ribeiro
description: Self-service laundry room with three washing machines and three dryers.

title: (4940) Caminho do Agrelo - N303
description: Car park of beautiful river beach, with nice shade and beautiful surroundings! Close to picnick area and small bar and restaurant. Public toilets available. At night it was a bit noisy and dark which unfortunatly made our night less peaceful!

title: (4940) Parada - 276 EM519
description: Picnic area with tables, barbecue, water intake and on the banks of a small stream that gives to cool off, located in a rural environment with a lot of peace

title: (4940) Formariz - Rua do Burgo
description: Ample parking on grass, partly shaded, no services, there is a fountain nearby, across the street.

title: (4940) Formariz -
description: Flat space on the side of an unpaved road, used only by hikers. In the middle of the woods. The dirt road can be traveled by any means, but it is necessary to pass through the town to reach it, the asphalted road is very steep, not suitable for large vehicles.

title: (4940-259) Paredes de Coura - Unnamed Road
description: Nice picnic area located on a very quiet street. Here, at most, the residents pass by, most of them greeting friendly. Fountain, barbecue and benches available. Very nicely located under trees. We stayed one night.

title: (4940) Parede de Coura - Unnamed Road
description: Parking with 360° view. Water point. Table, trash can. Very calm. The night was pleasant. No toilet.

title: (4940-132) Rubiães - Unnamed Road
description: Nice garden with parking spaces in a small village. we spent the night in a Van, it was perfect. Very quiet and with a nice view. Not many houses and most of them abandoned.

title: (4990-660) Labrujó -
description: Small pitch on the edge of a forest track. two viewpoints nearby. be careful it is a passable forest track but not for all vehicles. there are almost 2km of dirt road. We don't have a 4x4, but our T4 is slightly elevated. Departure of hike possible. No services. The culms are magnificent with outcropping rocks.

title: (4940-604) Porreiras - Unnamed Road
description: Very spacious site with plenty of parking space. It is on top of a hill with spectacular views and tables to eat in the shade.

title: (4970) Sabadim - Unnamed Road
description: Stop for the night finds by chance, tables and old closed facilities. We are lost far from everything and it s beautiful. Garbage cans are no longer collected, remember to clean and keep the place clean

title: (4940) Paredes de Coura - 661 EM1035
description:
Tap with fresh water, next to the church.
opposite is a beautiful and charming abandoned villa.
the path to the source (5 MT) is narrow, just a T3/T4 fits

title: (4940) - EM1076
description: Place only for a van, on a bend, safe, near a church. We spent a night in absolute calm! The only small constraint: the church bells ring until 10 p.m. and do not start again in the morning until 7 a.m.! Otherwise the place is peaceful, some inhabitants of the hamlet walked by in the evening and kindly greeted us! Perfect for one night!

title: (4930) Valença - EM1055
description: Area in the middle of nature with a route to a waterfall

name: Quinta Santa Marinha Enoturismo & Alojamento
title: (4970) Quinta Santa Marinha Enoturismo & Alojamento
description:
Wine estate, other artisanal and organic products.
If you do not wish to use your own facilities.
You can benefit from Dry Toilets and Ecological showers at your disposal.

By reservation:
Wine tasting: 15€/person. I would offer you a taste of 3 different wines, accompanied by small cold meats or other depending on availability.
Meals: €25/person.
Wine served on site: €10/bottle.
Oenological visit included wine tasting €20.00/person
Gouter–Snack basket for 2 people: €30.00 assortment of cold meats or other depending on availability + 1 bottle of chilled wine.
Breakfast €15.00/person.
Wine to take away €30.00 per box of 6 bottles, possibility of shipping to your address.
Electricity: 15€/24 hours.
The key word tranquility and beauty, always available for our campers.
Very close to Parque Peneda/Geres, Sistelo & Ecovia do rio Vez.
Location reservation preferable 24 hours in advance.
You can visit or do your shopping as many times as you want and keep your location.
Note: Meals are always prepared according to seasonal availability, products from the property or as close as possible, as organic as possible and never products that are out of season or have been around the planet 3 times.

title: (4920) - N303
description: Nice place for a stopover. More beautiful and peaceful than the noisy stops on the road. Barbecue grills and many tables to eat. The parking space offers only a few flat spots. Really great plus just one minute from the highway.

title: (4990-655) Labruja - 1314 Rua do Santuário do Senhor do Socorro
title_short: (4990-655) Labruja - 1314 Rua do Santuário do Senhor do Socorro
description: Parking for small van, next to natural pools, old mills tour and a monastery on the Santiago path. At the monastery there's a shaded area good for bigger vehicles. The roads are narrow though.

address.street: 1314 Rua do Santuário do Senhor do Socorro

title: (4920) Sapardos - 801 N303
description: Just a break by the side of the road. Wide ground which allows to stop for lunch with a beautiful view.

title: (4970) Extremo - EM505
description: Incredible panoramic view with picnic tables, barbecue and water (not possible to empty the dirty water on the other hand, nor toilets). Clean (please leave it that way and leave with your waste, including toilet paper). Quiet on a parallel and flat road, top. I don't recommend windy nights though.

title: (4920) Candemil - N303
description: Picnic spot on side of road. Could sleep the night. Water and bins available.

title: (4970) Padreiro - M523
description:
Beautiful park with tables and barbecue.
The forest around is gorgeous, and it also have a playground.
It is possible to watch the wild horses as they feed around the forest.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: River beach / Praia do Seixal with easy access. A beautiful spot in Vez river with plenty of space for parking and staying overnight. Bar that works (at least) in the summer. Perfect spot for kids.

name: Camping Covas Park
title: () Camping Covas Park
description: Muito bom, um típico parque de campismo bem cuidado. O pessoal foi extremamente simpático 5 estrelas.

title: (4950) Monção - 63 EM1104
description: Ample parking of the bar "cafe bar da escola" where we are well received with our vehicles and we can spend the night quietly, lovely people, do not charge for parking and cater to the traveler in a pleasant way

title: (4920) - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place on the mountain surrounded by nothing but nature. Beautiful view. Very quiet and secluded. Not suitable for large motorhomes. 4x4 an advantage, but we got along well with our 2wd T4.

title: (4920) Covas - Zona de Lazer de Covas
title_short: (4920) Covas - Zona de Lazer de Covas
description:
Pic nic area with parking, in the nature. Super beautiful and calm!
There are picnic tables and benches, a barbecue area, with sink. The toilets were closed, but the building seems quite new.
It's right at the Coura river where you can go for a shallow swim, super idilic.
Beware of the access, because the path is a bit steep and bumpy, and right at the curve. We have a 6m motorhome, and it worked for us.

title: (4930) Monte do Faro - 6 N101-1
description: Site next to picnic area. There is a fountain near the lookout. We didn't stay overnight, we just parked to see the views. It seems calm.

title: (4920) - Unnamed Road
description: Natural pitch on top of the hill, ocean views and absolute peace, an excellent place to spend time in complete solitude

title: (4920-140) Alto das Cerejas - 5 Rua da Tomada
title_short: (4920-140) Alto das Cerejas - 5 Rua da Tomada
description: Motorhome area, just behind the restaurant Braseria do Minho, paved, open in 2016, a lot of space

title: (4970) - 112-101 N202-2
description: space on the side of the road

title: (4970) Viana do Castelo District - 202 EM1286
description: Parking in the ground, along a small road. High quality swimming in the river, access to the Ecovia for hiking. Quiet bar nearby. A few kilometers from the beautiful village of Sistelo. Stunning terraced rural landscape.

title: (4930) - Unnamed Road
description: St Ovidio viewpoint

title: (4970-457) Arcos de Valdevez - 71 Rua Doutor Joaquim Carlos da Cunha Cerqueira
title_short: (4970-457) Arcos de Valdevez - 71 Rua Doutor Joaquim Carlos da Cunha Cerqueira
description: Self-service laundry, open every day from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. Plenty of parking spaces nearby.

address.street: 71 Rua Doutor Joaquim Carlos da Cunha Cerqueira

title: (4910) Arga de Baixo -
description: Large parking lot with picnic tables. It is next to a road but not very busy. It is the parking lot to access the climbing sector. There are no services, no garbage can, so it is our responsibility to take our garbage :)

title: (4990) Arcozelo - EM1240-1
description: Well for a quiet break next to a church

title: (36791) - Unnamed Road
description: Port of Rio Miñio fishermen, equipped with picnic table, barbecue, water point. Beware of floods, it is better to stay a little higher. Night without worry, very calm. No service.

title: (4970) Giela - M1322
description: Public swimming pool where you can take a warm shower for 1 euro

title: () Arcos de Valdevez Municipality - N101
description: River in Arcos de Valdevez Portugal very nice view.

title: (4920) Vila Meã - Unnamed Road
description: Gas bottle exchange (Falcão Gomez Gás): We exchanged our Campingaz 904 bottle here. They also have other models from Campingaz :)

title: (4970-482) Arcos de Valdevez - EM1322
description: Free parking shared with cars by the river. ideal for visiting the village. there is a passarelle that leads to the cnetre. A bit noisy for the night. beautiful walks along the river. With water next to it.

title: (4970-500) Salvador - 687 Rua da Fonte Santa
description: Tables and barbecues, stairs to the river

title: (4910) Arga de Cima - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent view Picnic tables start of hikes very very quiet

title: (4920) Gavea - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park overlooking the valley. Bigger than the viewpoint with the swing. We went up there with our 7m30 cc without any worries. In this month of January, the place is deserted. A flat part can allow you to land for the night.

title: (4980-020) R. do Rio - Ecovia
description: Nice place for a nice stopover on the banks of the Rio Lima. No prohibition signs for overnight parking. Tables and bike path nearby

title: (4990) - Ecovia
description: Superb places, access to a small beach on the rio Lima. Ecovia passes in front, bike ride or on foot. barbecues on site. very little frequented during the week. almost alone all day (in September)

title: (4920) Campos - 8 Avenida 1 de Janeiro
description: Parking at the football stadium. Almost no traffic.

title: (4930) Cristêlo Côvo - IP1
description: Ample ground parking, next to the Wednesday market. Flat. Without services.

title: (4930-678) Valença - 9 Avenida Miguel Dantas
description: Park for those traveling with a quiet night, plenty of space to visit Valença, go shopping and eat a good cod. No service for children.

title: (4990) Refoios - Refoios
description: On the edge of the river. Fairly flat area for lunch and perhaps to spend a night there (no prohibition signs). Possible for 1 or 2 vehicles. At the end of the road so very quiet. A few locals have parked there to take advantage of the calm of the place.

title: (4920) Lovelhe - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
title_short: (4920) Lovelhe - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
description: Seen 180 degrees on the river border between Portugal and Spain. Small parking without convenience ... Road not wide to access that climbs a lot ... What a view!

title: (4930-674) Valença - 18 Avenida Doutor Tito Fontes
description: Lidl park. 1 minute from the city center.

title: (4920) - Estrada da Senhora da Encarnação
description: Quiet location overlooking the Hispano-Portuguese border. Water point, picnic tables, barbecue available. No service. Possibility to sleep there one night.

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: On the edge of a dirt track quite wide and driveable (but a little ravinée) possible to park flat 2 or 3 vehicles type cell or van. Nice view of the valley and the forest. For pic nic or very quiet night.

title: (36791) Pontevedra - 22A Lugar O Monte
description: Public fountain to catch water. It parks well next to it.

title: (4930-596) Valença - 13 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Stationary on very quiet place and near the fortress

title: (4930-655) Valença - 25 Rua dos Seixos
description: Quiet and pleasant place with playground and leisure park. Close to the historic area and the Minho bike path.

title: (4970) - IC28
description: Shaded car park, Riverside, very nice people during the day (mid-August), quiet at night. Picnic table, small bar during the day. No water but for canister (access). Good spot.

title: (4930) Valença - EM1046
description: Perfect place to leave your RV while visiting the fortress of Valença do Minho (12 Century). If one wishes to stay overnight... no problem at all, local Police station is in front and usualy they don’t implícate with us.

title: (4990) Ribeira - Ecovia
description: Tables and barbecues by the river

title: (4930) Valença - 6 Avenida de Espanha
description: Ground parking.

title: (4990-670) - 112 EM1230
description: Magnificent panoramic view of Ponte de Lima, with tables.

title_short: (4930-678) Valença - 1867 Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Rua do Espírito Santo
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Rua do Espírito Santo
description: Magnificent view on the heights 2 km from the village. Calm.

title: (4930) Valença - 982 Avenida Pinto da Mota
description:
Parking de tierra bastante plano,sin limitación de altura y fácilmente maniobrable para vehículos grandes cercano a la fortaleza.
lugar muy tranquilo donde pasar la noche cercano al casco urbano

title: (4930) - Ecopista
description: Large car park right next to the river and where you can start a cycle path by the ecopist. We stayed here one night and it happened to be a very quiet location as there was no traffic. There are trash cans near the park and recreation area. Clean toilets, there is a water point available, a bar, picnic tables, games for children, barbecues etc...

title: (4990) - 637 N203
description: Park Day and night

title: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (4930) Valença - Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Although next to the walls of Valencia there is a lot of parking for tourists, this one has the advantage of not being dirt but cobblestone, very used by buses. quiet and very close to the Puerta do Sol, has no services.

address.street: Avenida dos Combatentes da Grande Guerra

title: (4970) Cesta - IC28
description: Ideal place to sleep near the water. Follow the road next to the cornfields.

title: (4980-020) - N203
description: A tap of water, drinking according to the local residents. usual threaded connection just behind the wall while climbing the steps towards the church square

title: (4990-027) Ponte de Lima - 722 Estrada da Veiga
title_short: (4990-027) Ponte de Lima - 722 Estrada da Veiga
description: Parquing de Expolima, I wonder that nobody put this site, because I have arrived and it is full of Motorhomes

title: (4990-150) Pte. de Lima - Refoios
description: Parking 5 minutes from the city center, without any indication of a camping ban because we spent the very very pleasant night there facing the Rio minho. under the plane trees. I don't think it's possible in the middle of summer. we were there on 04/27/2022

title: (4920-279) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 12 Rua Dom Manuel I
title_short: (4920-279) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 12 Rua Dom Manuel I
description: Laundromat

title: (4920-275) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 10 Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
title_short: (4920-275) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 10 Avenida Heróis do Ultramar
description: A large car P in the middle of the interesting small city, flat, illuminated and aside Minho river, without limitations or prohibitions. NOTE: week open market each Saturday morning, so do not park Friday night till Saturday after lunchtime. Perfect for visiting the city. It has public bathrooms. Train line aside but N 13 main road is a little away.

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 4920 Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - 4920 Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
description: Small car park next to the vaccination center, in a dead end under the olive trees. Small fountain to cool off. Quiet place to stop for lunch or even spend the night because it is also suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (4920) Loivo - Unnamed road
description: Cozy place with shade and a good restaurant next door to eat typical food from the country.

title: (4920) Lovelhe - 17 Avenida do Tomiño
description:
Parking between the soccer field and the cemetery
level without services or restrictions for motorhomes and campers three hundred meters from the center

title: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Avenida dos Pescadores
title_short: (4920) Vila Nova de Cerveira - Avenida dos Pescadores
description: Area for campers near the town. Restaurants, bar, bakeries and of petiscos (Portuguese tapas).

title: (4980-020) Ponte da Barca - Largo da Feira
title_short: (4980-020) Ponte da Barca - Largo da Feira
description: Shared parking with cars near the center and the bridge. Nice walk on the river. There is also a river beach. Recreation area, fountain and services 100 meters from the car park. This is where they place the fair, so at parties it will not be possible to park.

title: (36721) Os Baños - 74 Rúa Baños
description: Next to the river Miño in Caldelas. In summer there is a chiringuito open and at the end of August there are very popular festivals and it gets full of people. you have to be careful in winter with the rises in the river flow. beautiful views and possibility of routes and bathing

title: (36700) Tui - 15 Rúa Barca
description:
Several areas with parking and views of the river Miño.
Good place to spend the day with the family, children's area, walks along the river.
Very quiet to sleep.

title: (36729) Os Baños - 37 Rúa Baños
description: At the end of a small road, we spent a single, hassle-free night near the Mino River.

title: (4990-150) Pte. de Lima - Travessa de Arcos Limia
title_short: (4990-150) Pte. de Lima - Travessa de Arcos Limia
description: Free parking full of places, quiet. By bike or on foot by the old bridge 2 km from the city center. Garbage. No water. Had 2 nights without problem.

title: (36750) Goián - 41A Lugar O Couto
description: Good location good view of Portugal at the Miño river bank.

title: (4970) Sistelo -
description: Place to find magnificent to sleep unexpectedly in this very mountainous area. You can park with 3 vans but in single file by entering a small recess at the edge of the river. Narrow for a motorhome. There is an ecovia hike departure. We can swim. Continue on the road to the left after the religious monument with the picnic tables. It's a dead end. On Google Map this place is indicated ''Praia fluvial de sistelo'', but the road is not mentioned.

title: (36730) Tomino - 25 Lugar O Ramo
description: Very quiet place, on the bank of the river. There is a cobblestone base to park 3 motorhomes and a ramp to lower boats to the river. It also has a bar-restaurant 500 m away where you can eat very well.

title: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
title_short: (4930) Verdoejo - Caminho do Parque das Merendas
description: Picnic area with toilets and drinking water. Next to the ecopista and river miño.

title: (4990-150) Ponte de Lima - R. Dr. Luis Gonzaga
title_short: (4990-150) Ponte de Lima - R. Dr. Luis Gonzaga
description: Residential area with a school nearby

name: Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
title: (4920) Area Recreativa Caravanas da Lenta
description: Lovelhe river beach. Nice place to spend the day, picnic and swim. There is a bathroom and cold showers. The Center of Vilanova de Cerveira is 2 minutes away.

title: (4950) Lapela - Rua do Rio Minho
description: Nice place to spend a night or two. Right next to the Minho River and Torre de Lapela. This is a picnic area with tables, restrooms, barbecues and water nearby. Try not to reach the place through the village as the curves are short and could damage your motorhome. There is a road around the village which also leads to this picnic spot! In the village you will find a café and a supermarket.

title: (4970) Arcos de Valdevez - 108 EN202
description: Well with good access and exit. It can be easily driven and parked behind the fountain. Water flow is strong. The spout is very large, so use a watering can or bucket.

title: (4990-072) Ponte de Lima - 80 Rua Agostinho José Taveira
title_short: (4990-072) Ponte de Lima - 80 Rua Agostinho José Taveira
description: Very extensive free parking, it has a height limiter. 2m approx. In front of the river, with lots of shade, and close to the old town.

name: Piscinas Municipais de Ponte da Barca
title: (4980-020) Piscinas Municipais de Ponte da Barca
title_short: (4980-020) Piscinas Municipais de Ponte da Barca
description: No facilities but a cafe very close to the tennis court and the swimming area, where you can take a shower. Nice park and workout gadgets nearby.

name: Área de autocaravanas Tui
title: (36700) Área de autocaravanas Tui
description: Motorhome parking for a maximum of 3 vehicles. Water available on site, disposal possible via a hole in the ground. It is approx. 500 meters to the village. It is a place of pilgrimage with corresponding prices, but worth seeing. Access maximum 3.5 tons.

title: (36711) Tui - 7 Estrada de Anta
description: CC service area adjacent to the discount service station.

title: (36711) Tui - 5 Lugar Gayos
description: Bargaoil gas station, lovely Vanessa lets us throw gray ones in the black car washes in the toilets, leaving them clean as they were and get clean water, she also lets us sleep at the gas station

title: (4920) - Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho
title_short: (4920)  - Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho

address.street: 7 Avenida Engenheiro Delfim de Sousa Coutinho

title: (4990-150) Ponte de Lima - Veigas
description: New construction area in a place with poor access. Almost impossible on market day and Feiras Novas. today 9/5/22 it is not under construction but it is quite abandoned and dirty. one faucet broken, the other in use. It is parking day and night and the only one enabled for motorhomes according to the information and tourism office, which by the way is the best of all the ones I have visited in Portugal.

title: (36740) A Pedra -
description: Very calm. Ample parking. Tables and benches. River path. Bathing area

Camping Quinta de Pentieiros, inside  Lagoas de Bertiandos protected area.
Traditional camping with area for campers, grass parking. There is an educational animal farm, playground and swimming pool. Very family friendly.

name: LavExpress

description: Lavandaria selfservice

title: (36720) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Earthen parking at the edge of the river. Some places overlooking the river. Trees to have shade.

title_short: (4990-077) Ponte de Lima - 123 Rua Conde de Aurora

title_short: (4990-150) Ponte de Lima - 9 Rua Salvato Feijó

title: (36700) Tui - 22A Rúa Canónigo Valiño
description: Very quiet free parking 800 meters from tui cathedral, without services

title: (36700) Tui - 4 Rúa Ourense
description: Free parking, quiet and many places

title: (4970) Vale -
description:
Vale do Caracol Located in a valley, between mountains and streams, this space is located in an area where organic products are produced.
 Grassy area, with possibility of access to drinking water, electricity and bathroom with hot shower. Opportunity to buy and harvest your own organic vegetables.
 Possibility to visit the educational farm. BEFORE YOUR ARRIVAL, write to us or contact us.
Don't show up unexpectedly, otherwise I might not be here.

title: (4970) Sistelo - 1997 N304
description: Small picnic area where you can spend the night next to the road. Good views of the valley.

title: (36700) Tuy - 2A Prolongación Alcalde Casal Aboy
description: Solar used as parking, also close to the health center, there are two others closer, this seemed the quietest / safest and suitable for our trailer .

title: (36700) Tuy - 1 O Rollo
description: Esplanade and wide and free streets. Useful when the municipal parking lot is too full to maneuver.

title: (36700) Tui - 34 Rúa O Pilar
description: LAUNDRY

title: (4990-348) Ponte de Lima - 74 Rua da Cancinhola
title_short: (4990-348) Ponte de Lima - 74 Rua da Cancinhola
description: Self-service washing machine in the parking lot of the Intermaché supermarket. Machines are a bit older, washing time is twice as long as advertised. Drying  10kg, 18kg, but only 2 machines in total.

title: (4950) Mazedo - Parking Igreja
description:
Huge and empty car park by the church, asphalted and inclined. Beautiful views on the foggy mountains in the morning. Quiet at night, church bells in the morning. Little shade, toilets and water behind the church. 

2km from Monçao, which was too noisy for us on a Friday night.

title: (36740) Tomiño - 8 Camiño do Alivio
description: Parking at center of Tomiño with shade (with limit of height) and without shade (without limit). Plain and with all services by side.

title: (36740) Tomiño - 17 Rúa Gondomar
description: Self-service launderette, very friendly operators!

title: (36750) Galicia - 42 Avenida Ordóñez
description: Self-service laundry

title: (36750) - 8 Avenida Pío Troncoso
description:
8 places conditioned by the Tomiño town hall. Close to supermarkets and an area of
 playtime.

title: (36760) El Rosal - Camiño do Río
description: Very extensive place for all types of vehicles, with beach, promenade, abundant shadows, restaurants and tranquility

title: (4970) - 112 Rua de Senra
description: Hidden Gem! fabulous Beautiful location, perfect spot. Between the water and the vineyards. Sometimes some locals here.  SUP and kayak perfection. Water rises every night. So park up at the big tree. In the morning it goes down again. Small bar and supermarket in town, 900 mtr away.

title: (4910) - 160 Caminho do Cabo
description: Quiet and beautiful site, where there is a river where you can swim and a small waterfall with several wheels of mills. There is a small bar next door, easy to get to. Ideal to spend the day, I do not know if you can spend the night

name: Aneli Sertuy
title: (36720) Aneli Sertuy
description: Gas station with free shower. Very nice staff. We took a shower and filled up the fuel afterwards (also cheap)

title: (36712) Tui - A-55
description: Playground and picnic areas next to the parking area. On the outskirts of Tui. Water fountain. There is a taperia right in front. Ideal to go with children.

title: (4950) Cortez - Avenida da Boavista Monção
description: 3 parking spaces in the Continente supermarket car park reserved for AC

title: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - Caminho da Chousa
title_short: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - Caminho da Chousa
description: Beautiful and relaxing place surrounded by nature

title: (4910-201) Lanhelas - 281 Rua Ilídio Couto
description: A great view of the river a very nice place to stay for a night, there are potable water points and picnic tables. Don't fire and clean the deposit dirt water no service is available.

title: (4990) Correlhã - 35 EM536
description: Village fountain - antique washing place. Very large water flow. Have a good round trip. Space for 2 mobiles, also longer ones. Water can only be removed with a watering can or bucket, as the pipe has a very large diameter.

title: (4910) Lanhelas - 110 Estrada do Rio
description: Picnic in area Minho flumen.

title: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - 121 Estrada da Ponte
title_short: (4910) Vilar de Mouros - 121 Estrada da Ponte
description: Nice place next to a bridge to spend the night.

title: (4925) Montaria - 414 CM1179
description: A parking lot, without prohibition signs or the like - a good starting point for hikes. The waterfalls start right around the corner and offer a good opportunity for swimming! We spent a very quiet night here! Wide driveway.

title: (4925) - CM1179
description: Beautiful spot to stay overnight at the village Montaria at Serra D’Arga. From here you have several hikes departures including the PR5 to Pincho Waterfalls. Restaurants, bars and mini-markets around. Super quite at night!!

title: (4910) Dem - 926 EM526
description: Good place to refill drinking water. E-bike charging possible

name: Área de servizo de Caravanas
title: (36450) Área de servizo de Caravanas
description: Quiet area on the banks of the Minho River and close to Canuda Park. Parking is only 2 hours there, and overnight stays are no longer allowed.

title: (36450) Salvatierra de Miño - Paseo Fluvial
description: Parking at the foot of the river, it is very quiet at night. During the day it is more traveled by having a playground. Perfect to go with bicycles or kayaks, there is a bike path that passes through the parking lot and follows everything along the river side.

title: (4910-204) Lanhelas - 1270 N13
description: Inexpensive GASOLAR gas station with GPL - Attention! Only cash payment possible. ATM directly at the gas station. Adblue can also be tanked.

title: (36712) Tui - 159 PO-3001
description: Nice little place in peace, just next door you can take the path that goes down for 100m and you are right at the edge of the stream.

title: (4990) Correlhã -
description: Nice spot with a lot of trees. Nice picnic area and very calm possible to overnight. Natural water source in the picnic park and a Snack bar. A few meters away a very nice and good restaurant with Portuguese traditional food. (Better to make reservation in advance)

title: (36760) O Rosal - Unnamed Road
description: Small hold of descent of boats, in my opinion of premises. Peaceful place, without water or service. Facing the Portuguese coast that are noisy with the train line but no more. Not recommended for large vehicles, access by narrow roads. No height limit.

title: (4910) Orbacém -
description: Side of road with no homes around

title: (4950-454) Monção - Av Afonso III
description: Ground parking shared with cars. We stayed several times very quiet. two minutes from downtown.

title: (4950) Monção - 1 Rua Monsenhor Avelino Gonçalves
description: Ideal for visiting, no service, at the foot of the fortress. Huge semi-shaded car park close to the historic center

title: (4950) Monção - 8 EM1097-1
description: Huge parking lot, no prohibition signs. Quiet nights! There is a water tap, but without thread. Highly recommended! Please note: every Thursday there is a market in this parking lot. So DO NOT park between Thursday 05:00 am and Thursday 18:00 pm

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 33 Rúa de Galicia
description: Salvatierra de Miño, has a walk along the banks of the Miño River, areas to visit such as its walls, and has free parking for motorhomes

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 10 Rúa Castelao
description: Laundry, it is the cheapest in the area.

title: (4950) Monção - 1 N202

title: (4970) Cabana Maior -

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
title_short: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - 23 Bajo, Rúa Castelao
description: Acolada Self-Service Laundry. Easy parking. There is a water fountain right on the next corner.

title: (4925) - EM526
description: At the edge of country road for 3 places of campervans and in the middle of the mountains. Very good restaurant typical of the region 10 min walk. Unbeatable value for money: absolutely taste the white champorrio.

title: (36760) O Río -
description: At the end of the path is a turning hammer, there is a small space under trees. There are stone benches and tables. Right on the water. 1-2 street lanterns nearby. We spent a quiet night and a nice day here. Of course no service

title: (4950) Monção - 10 Avenida das Caldas
description: Parking of the public garden. Playground for the little ones. Advised by the tourist office. River at 50m. Shady. We are Monday and everything is calm. Opportunity to have water from the caretaker at the pool.

title: (4950-096) - EM1112-2
description: Lovelylittle restaurante by the road nice service good food

title: (4970) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful belvedere to spend a night and observe the wildlife.

description: Parking next to the Hot Water Municipal Baths of Salvaterra de Miño.

title: (4910) Orbacém -

title: (4910-188) Dem -
description: Small quiet place lost in the mountains with amazing views, many picnic tables available as well as 2 barbecues and trash cans. There is also a small water pond and an old chapel. It can easily park 8 cars and 4 motorhomes. To discover

title: (4970) Soajo - N202

title: () Soajo - N202

title: (4950) Monção - 152 EN202
description: drinking water fountain. Water is controlled and suitable for consumption. Access and exit excellent. No faucet or thread. Therefore only with bucket and watering can.

title: (4970) São Jorge - 393 EM530

title: (4910-347) Seixas - 39 Rua da Boalheira
description: Small, flat car park along a train line with a view of the river. Space for 4 not too big Motorhomes. Departure of walks. Very beautiful view

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - PO-510
description: Area for motorhome and van. Open since April 2015 water and emptying. The site is not ideal for sleeping because it is surrounded by roads, but is 5 minutes walk from the center and is the point of the Landres River road that is adjacent to it.

title: (4950) - EM1120

Nice place with a lot of space

cold shower, piknik tables and barbecues.
great calm place for people with childrens

title: (36713) O Guindal -
description: Just off the road going to Tui from Baiona. Behind a mound. A pleasant walk into the forest. No services only 2 bars of 4g. Room for 2 motor homes.

title_short: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 26 Rúa Rafael Tilve Adrio

title: (4730) - 187 N101
description: I especially wanted to indicate this place for its drinking fountain in drinking water (known locally) that can serve well when there is little reserve and camp nature.

title: (36470) Salceda de Caselas - 21 Rúa Pontevedra
description: Quiet area with some trees. You can spend the night and the service area is about 400 meters. It is about 50 meters from the center with all the shops around.

title: (4910) - EM526-1

title: (4925) Amonde - N305
description: Quiet picnic area with toilets, grill, small river and moutain view. Plenty of green

title: (4910) Seixas - 6 Avenida da Marginal
description:
Illuminated and very quiet parking beside the river Miño. Highly recommended to spend the night without problems.
Right next to Seixas at less than 100 mt.

title: (4990) Rebordões - 1073 CM1262
description: source of fresh water. Water not controlled by the municipality. However, it tastes good. Entry and exit via single-lane road. But wide enough and without hairpin bends. Also feasible for longer vehicles.

title: (36712) Tui - Unnamed Road
description: Monte Aloya, there is a bar there are WCs, there is no motorhome service.

title: (4990) Queijada - Rua de Rial
description: Parking behind the church, near cemetery. Quiet. No nearby house. The fields.

title: (4980-741) São João Batista de Vila Chã - CM1345
title_short: (4980-741) São João Batista de Vila Chã - CM1345
description:
New parking area next to the museo do quartzo.
Barbecue spots and a public toilet open during the day. Could get busy with pilgrims on the weekend.

address.city: São João Batista de Vila Chã

title: (4970) - 320 EM530
description: Cemetery parking. Good views, quiet. For those who like solitude in open spaces.

title: (36770) O Rosal - 15 A Cumieira Abaixo
description: Picnic area easily accessible to all sizes. Calm and pleasant near a river. Not tested at night, no parking ban

title: (36450) Salvaterra de Miño - CP-9002
description: Cordeiro river beach. Quite shady place and lots of tables. Very flat and away from main roads, so I don't think it will get too crowded

title: (4980-020) Entre Ambos-os-Rios -
description: Small quiet corner by the water

title: (36760) O Rosal - 12 Lugar Ponte Da Tamuxe
title_short: (36760) O Rosal - 12 Lugar Ponte Da Tamuxe
description: Picnic area among eucalyptus trees with lots of shade. Wood tables. Nice view of the river and there is a Roman bridge. We have not slept but it looks like we can sleep peacefully.

name: Lima Escape - Empreendimentos Turísticos
title: (4980-312) Lima Escape - Empreendimentos Turísticos
description:
*ATTENTION: 14-30.11 CAMPING CLOSED* Lovely campsite with restaurant in the home, away from the road and quiet.
Our camping park consists of three medium and large tent areas and one small tent area. These are located in their respective rectangular plots, arranged under a leafy forest composed of oaks and pines that extends to Lima River. 
It has an area for Caravans and Motorhomes and its own service station. 
The camping provides customers with ACSI and ADAC’s discounts (special price card applicable in low season).
Caravans and motorhomes are allowed to enter until 10:00 pm as well as the tents to be set down.

address.street: Lugar de Igreja, P/C of entre Ambos-os-Rios

title: (36760) El Rosal - 36760 Pías
description: About ten possible locations almost flat on the edge of children's play areas, tennis, ... places in the shade and a pretty wooded park. Garbage cans available. Thank you to the municipality for tolerating us

title: (36760) O Rosal - 13 Camiño do Cotro
description: Parking at the mouth of the Tamuxe river with swings, football field, beach bar, tables. There is a small path to walk to the watermills. Quiet area to spend the night.

title: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
title_short: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
description: Next to the Lanheses Dock, this lovely riverside spot is a gem to park your motorhome for a day or a night. Access is also easy with larger mobile homes. The dock has its own paved car park, however these are too narrow and preferred by the locals, so use the gravel/grass space on the left (max 3 RVs). Lots of people walk and bike during the day, but it's quiet at night. Picnic tables, hiking trails, green river landscape. At the end of the playground on the left, in the direction of the village, there is an outhouse.

title: (4980-020) Entre Ambos-os-Rios -
description: Beautiful spot along the river, with a floating dock.  Easy to reach with any vehicle. No trashcans so take it back with you! friendly locals and Fisher men. We spend the night, went on a hike in the morning and stayed till late in the day before we left. We loved the place!

title: (4980-020) - CM1348
description: Sports Center Parking. Get of the road to a little village called Entre Ambos os Rios, there you'll find a sign saying "Gimnodesportivo". A big parking spot with good light by night and friendly people.

title: (4980-020) - N203
description: Small road that leads to a launch! place for 1 truck or 2 one behind the other :) super spot a bit sloping but all alone!

title: (36760) A Gándara -
description: There is a picnic table and an esplanade where several vans fit. There is a big tree that provides shade for a van. Quiet site, a dirt road passes nearby but with almost no traffic.

title: (4980-020) Entre Ambos-os-Rios - N203
description: Place for 4x4. Just in the lagoon where the inhabitants come to swim ...

title: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
title_short: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
description: Spacy unpaved area right next to the river Lima, the ground wavy but you should be able to position your vehicle evenly. Some thirty metres away there are houses, but it doesn't feel like parking in their garden. You can take some steps into the river, but beware if its strong current! There's a boat landing, but only some three or four boats lie there. Traffic noises are audible in the distance. Of course some people, also youngsters, pass by and enjoy the place. All in all, for me it was a quite agreeable mixture of private and taking notice of civilisation. The access road is unproblematic for medium-sized vehicles, except for the last meters that are quite bumpy so you better go pretty slow there.

title: (4980-020) - 399 CM1348
description: Small market. Offers a little more than the small market of camping. There are also gas cartridges to buy.

title: (36770) O Rosal - 8D Avenida Ramon Franco
description: Parking close to all services, a little inclined. You can spend the night

title: (4910-105) Caminha - 36 Avenida Padre Pinheiro
description: Nice and quiet parking lots, for small motorhomes.

title: (36440) As Neves - 12 Estrada Circunvalación
description: Good and bright place to park and spend the night. The road is on the side, but cars hardly pass at night. There is a school next door .. Very quiet place.

title: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
title_short: (36710) O Porto de Bouzas - 1C Lugar Cotarel
description: Former asphalt sports field in the middle of nature. The new park is just below. Beautiful view with stream, pick nick table and barbecue a few meters away. A few houses scattered around.
